Applies color labels to a set of component. 
Ensures neighbors can not share the same color label,
while trying to use the minimum number of colors.
Apply per component diagnostic color using the color labels.
Applies color labels to a set of component. Graph coloring ensures two neighbors can not have the same color label, while trying to use the minimum number of colors.
Collect half edges and convert them to edges by removing duplicates
This removes any duplicated line / edges and return only unique pairs. If if directly connect the flattened array to the value node after get_from_array, you will see the number of strands doubles.

here is something important. Let's assume A is duplicate of B, then B is a duplicate of A. 
When both of them detects a duplicate, we want to return only the smallest index for both cases.
Like this we can track if A or B has already been tagged as duplicate in the following loop.
For each half edges, we test it against the whole half edges array to find duplicates.
here we just want to continue looping when the current half edge tests against itself.
Here we test the half edge's point indices against all half edges in the array. If both are equal, we have a duplicated half edge.
For the last loop iteration, we get the first face vertex back in order to get the last edge.
We decompose the long2 structure to get the edge's point indices, and we use them to draw strands.
